feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: return accessTokenExpiresAt in oauth exchange and refresh by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15425
  • feat: Twipla app analytics added by @vikaspatil0021 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14780
  • feat: Umami analytics app added by @vikaspatil0021 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14783
  • fix: Seat Attendee Rescheduling Logic by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14784
  • fix: unexpected scrolling on event-types page by @RajdeepDs in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15452
  • fix: Offer seats events invites everyone regardless their availability schedule by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15171
  • fix: added empty screen for missing platform plan by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15467
  • fix: AvailabilitySettings atom shift pencil icon after input to make it wider by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15460
  • fix: Large padding on small screens for embedded booking widgets by @RushikeshGandhmal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15463
  • chore: v4.2.0 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15482

New Contributors

  • @RajdeepDs made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15452

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.1.12...v4.2.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add date overrides to availability settings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15459
  • fix: event type uses calvideo as location instead of user default by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15442
  • fix: Remove comment about private api for now. by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15493
  • fix: correctly assign status code on rate limit error by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15435
  • chore: auth on api-v2 with api-key by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15455
  • fix: your name translation by @smitgol in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14863
  • refactor: only check platform billing for platforms by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15507
  • chore: v4.2.1 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15514

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.0...v4.2.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: modal logic for assignment reminder by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15488
  • fix: typo license key env type api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15519
  • fix: [CAL-3940] randomize Tip Sidebar by @jscafe-dev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15469
  • refactor: v2 event-types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15457
  • fix: AvailabilitySettings atom closing override window button by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15518
  • feat: Add Hungarian support by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14484
  • fix: Dashboard theme description in multiple languages by @Neon-20 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15486
  • fix: isChildEvent issue + loader is shown forever by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15524
  • fix: create instant meeting error if DAILY_SCALE_PLAN is false by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15508
  • fix: Webex app not working by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15485
  • fix: #15487 select arbitary start time by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15523
  • chore: Only run E2E suite when ready-for-e2e label added by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15529
  • fix: New CI workflow flaws in detecting the ready-for-e2e label on PRs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15534
  • chore: Make ready-for-e2e label check more robust by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15536
  • chore: Add GH actions test branch by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15541
  • chore: streamline ready-for-e2e label check for PRs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15545
  • chore: Remove check for labeled action by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15547
  • fix: v2 event-types versioning by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15549
  • chore: Attempt reduction of Sentry size by treeshaking tracing by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15527
  • fix: Translation for Dashboard Theme box is not available in all languages #15480 by @Yasshu55 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15484
  • fix: zoom shows up as location when expired instead of cal by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15153
  • feat: add monthly annual billing org form by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15520
  • fix: SAML: invalid_code issue, missing user error signing up by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15522
  • refactor: loadUsers and move to separate file by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15532
  • chore: IsOrg guard api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15563
  • fix: git-setup.sh to account for website default branch change by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15560
  • fix: stop shrinking icon when content overflows by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15565
  • fix: IsOrgGuard apiv2 casing by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15566
  • fix: Include business-days-plugin and window types in platform utils and types tsconfigs by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15569
  • chore: Release v4.2.2 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15568

New Contributors

  • @jscafe-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15469
  • @Yasshu55 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15484

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.1...v4.2.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: IsTeamInOrg guard and decorator apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15567
  • chore: IsUserInOrg guard by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15579
  • chore: Cache timezones by calcom version by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15556
  • fix: team billing on batch operations by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15570
  • chore: Removed unwanted CI changes that made it into main by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15580
  • feat: add instant meeting expiry input by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15555
  • fix: exclude web wrappers from dist by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15572
  • chore: Update PR template by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15581
  • chore: minimum required roles guard api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15576
  • fix: office365video expiry_date by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15561
  • feat: setting background color to red for remove button in profile section when hovered by @sbsangu in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15585
  • chore: Add dynamic import and trigger captureException by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15583
  • fix: Error in team members migration during org onboarding by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15349
  • fix: PATCH /me endpoint should capitalize timezone apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15593
  • fix: cancel sub when movingTeamToOrg by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15594
  • feat: organizations teams endpoints apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15586
  • fix: reduce cal recording bitrate by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15588
  • feat: apple calendar connect atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15510
  • fix: update version apiv2 platform libraries for createNewUsersConnectToOrgIfExists by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15601
  • fix: update z-index for intercom app launcher by @osamajandali in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15516
  • fix: Avoid error when moving a team that just has the owner of the org by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15595
  • feat: organization schedules endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15584
  • fix: E2E tests problems on PRs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15603
  • feat: booking no show webhook by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15502
  • fix: getPublicEventType of NonOrgUser fetch OrgUser event-type of same username by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15587
  • chore: v4.2.3 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15604

New Contributors

  • @sbsangu made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15585
  • @osamajandali made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.2...v4.2.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: adds env variable for email sender name by @dilpreetsio in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15598
  • refactor: move functions to separate files by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15590
  • fix: backward compatibility for old cal rooms by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15609
  • fix: Autodetection of time zone only updated default time zone by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15392
  • fix: Update pr.yml by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15611
  • feat: Support running webapp and embed-core playground on HTTPS. It allows to test SameSite cookie attribute easily in embed by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15272
  • fix: Provide event rescheduling option before the event end time by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15150
  • fix: Add fromRedirectOfNonOrgLink in getServerSideProps of private links by @balthazur in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15306
  • chore: Delete unused module by @RushikeshGandhmal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15631
  • fix: make toast consistent with brand colour by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15638
  • fix(@cal.com/web): update debounce logic to work correctly and not show non-premium usernames as premium by @theonly1me in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15629
  • fix: Redirect URL with query params by @vikas-verma in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13912
  • fix: typo in german translation by @rweisleder in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15637
  • refactor: remove duplicate object key in common.json by @RushikeshGandhmal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15626
  • fix: passing booking id in the payload by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15642
  • fix: Remove/Disable Duplicate button in Read Only mode of an event-type by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15511
  • fix: toast message is not showing and some refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15649
  • fix: assignAllTeamMembers field wrongly set in db by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15654
  • chore: update formbricks-js to newest version by @mattinannt in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15146
  • fix: platform seed script by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15617
  • feat: embed: remove "Preview" tab and instead split code/preview layout 50/50 vertically by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15492
  • feat: v1 API - add sort option on GET /bookings by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15374
  • chore: remove personal branding if in an org and use org branding by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14872
  • feat: RECORDING_TRANSCRIPTION_GENERATED webhook by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15589
  • fix: correct message and translation key by @RushikeshGandhmal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15657
  • fix: datePicker skeleton issue solved by @raza001 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15675
  • fix: booker atom types by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15685
  • feat: org-wide workflows by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15083
  • fix: remove assignment dialog by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15687
  • fix: 15636 Sort order of team event types incorrect by @fabio0296 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15660
  • fix: Broken navigation after booking creation in some cases by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15664
  • fix: guests are not appearing on the booking page and made some improvements by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15465
  • feat: app install flow followup by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15193
  • fix: Update stripe customer email when a user updates cal.com email by @martinsione in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15299
  • fix: incorrect booking seats full error on collective seated event by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15602
  • refactor: handleNewBooking #3 by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15612
  • chore: add caching apiv2 roles guard by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15694
  • fix: delete reserved slot on booker unmount by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15700
  • fix: 404s becoming 500s by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15696
  • chore: v4.2.4 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15703

New Contributors

  • @balthazur made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15306
  • @theonly1me made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15629
  • @rweisleder made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15637
  • @fabio0296 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15660

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.3...v4.2.4
